project_description: A modern event management platform similar to Luma, serving as a central hub for event creation, RSVP, and attendee management. It features a suite of upcoming tools (BatchMail, FrameIt, Certify, SnapGrid).

design_system.theme: Dark mode default, minimalist, high-contrast, 'Luma-like' aesthetic.

1_landing_page.hero_section: Bold headline, 'Host memorable events', CTA button.
1_landing_page.feature_grid: Showcase the 4 core tools (BatchMail, FrameIt, etc.) as 'Coming Soon' cards to show platform potential.

permissions.ORGANIZER: Can create events, view own event dashboard, scan tickets.

3_event_management.create_event_form: Fields for Title, Description, Date/Time, Location (Physical/Virtual), Capacity.
3_event_management.event_page: Public facing page with details and 'Register' button.
3_event_management.unique_url: Events should be accessible via dynamic routes /events/[id].

4_rsvp_attendance.registration: User clicks register -> Creates entry in database -> Generates unique Ticket ID.
4_rsvp_attendance.check_in: Toggle button in Admin Dashboard to mark attendee as 'Present' (Mockup for QR scanning).

5_admin_dashboard.overview: Stats cards: Total Events, Total Registrations, Attendance Rate.
5_admin_dashboard.data_table: List of attendees with filterable columns (Name, Email, Status, RSVP Date).

implementation_steps.task: Scaffold Next.js project and install Shadcn/UI components (Button, Card, Input, Table, Dialog, DropdownMenu).

implementation_steps.instruction: Implement the specific navigation links provided. Use visual cues (badges or tooltips) for the placeholder features.
Focus on typography and spacing. Use dummy gradients for visual appeal.
Create the shell for the logged-in experience.
Create a form to add events to a mock state or database. Create a grid view to display them.
Create the attendee management view. Include a toggle switch for 'Checked In' status.

coding_guidelines.style: Use functional components with typed props.
coding_guidelines.state_management: Use React Server Components for data fetching where possible. Use 'use client' only for interactive components.
coding_guidelines.responsiveness: All layouts must work on mobile.
